Validation function for auto_rate()

Source: R/auto_rate_funs.R
validate_auto_rate.Rd

This is an internal function for auto_rate(). Used to validate input arguments.

validate_auto_rate(df, by, method)

Arguments

df

data.frame object.
by

string.
method

string.

Value

a data.frame object of the original data

Examples

# this will pass:
set.seed(88)
df <- sim_data(len = 50)$df
validate_auto_rate(df, by = "row", method = "max")
#> $by
#> [1] "row"
#>

# this will fail as df is not a data.frame object:
# set.seed(88)
# df <- c(1:40)
# validate_auto_rate(df, by = "row", method = "max")

# this will fail as `by` argument isn't recognised:
# set.seed(88)
# df <- c(1:40)
# validate_auto_rate(df, by = "rat", method = "max")

# this will fail as df is not a data.frame object:
# set.seed(88)
# df <- c(1:40)
# validate_auto_rate(df, by = "row", method = "max")

# this will fail as `method` argument isn't recognised:
# set.seed(88)
# df <- c(1:40)
# validate_auto_rate(df, by = "row", method = "moo")
